bio.name: Greg
bio.welcomeMessage:
Once upon a time I built websites with framesets and lots of help from Macromedia: Dreamweaver, Fireworks and Flash.

The web has evolved a great deal since those days and thankfully, so have my skills.

jobs.title: @Self-Employed
jobs.description: Front-end development for agencies. ExpressionEngine builds, maintenance.

jobs.title: Tech & Marketing Director
jobs.description: Managed website. Designed and developed property lead generation site

jobs.title: Digital Project Manager
